name: The Zulu
startIntroPart1: You are the lion of the Zulu people. The reunited peoples from divided mecriocrity.
startIntroPart2: Your mission is to lead the Zulu to rule the world!
declaringWar: You stand in the way of my people. Let us solve this like warriors!
attacked: You dare have the courage to challenge nod, but no fear, for I will sweep you out of history.
defeated: You have the guts to call my body a corpse but beware, I know what will happen to our future- our tiberium future.
introduction: The Zulu nation acknowledges your presence.
tradeRequest: I am not always this generous, but we hope you take this rare opportunity we give you.

name: Great Zimbabwe
startIntroPart1: You are the Mambo, the leader beneath your ancient walls.
startIntroPart2: Lead your castle to lead the world!
declaringWar: It is sad that your actions have caused destruction.
defeated: Our golden bird will shine bright again!
introduction: The Zimbabwe Bird flies over you.
tradeRequest: I would be grateful if you agreed on the following proposal.
uniques: No damage penalty for wounded units <for [non-air] units>
